TEXT: A malevolent spirit sent to feast NL upon the inhabitants of the spire.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"dig~ DIG ~dig DIG ~DIG~ DIG~"~
A wizard with advancing and aggressive memory loss NL due to constant spire resurrection.
